creator: camposr@uol.com.br
text:
when using the rewritelock directive, no lock file is created.
due to this problem the synchronization between the httpd and the external 
lookup program fails.

the same mod_rewrite configuration works in apache 1.3.26, i tried to use mpm 
as worker and as prefork without success

creator: slive@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9534 ***
